panels.title: 当前 inode 使用情况

targets.expr:
(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance="$instance", fstype!~"nfs.*|tmpfs"} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance="$instance", fstype!~"nfs.*|tmpfs"}) /
node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance="$instance", fstype!~"nfs.*|tmpfs"}

(node_filesystem_files{cluster="$cluster", instance="$instance", fstype!~"nfs.*|tmpfs"} - node_filesystem_files_free{cluster="$cluster", instance="$instance", fstype!~"nfs.*|tmpfs"}) /
node_filesystem_files{cluster="$cluster", instance="$instance", fstype!~"nfs.*|tmpfs"}

panels.title: 磁盘 inode 使用情况
